resource: 1003164.description=Open door warning buzzer:A buzzer will sound if the vehicle reaches a speed of 3 mph (5 km/h) with any door open. 1003164.1002622.description=Open door warning buzzer:A buzzer will sound if the vehicle reaches a speed of 3 mph (5 km/h) with any door open. 1003164.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003164.vtc=true
